RE: Application #: CB250296641
Lutheran Social Services
400 N. Saginaw St.
Flint, MI 48502
Dear Ms. Sibilsky
Attached is the Original Licensing Study Report for the above referenced facility. The
study has determined substantial compliance with applicable licensing statutes and
administrative rules. Therefore, an original provisional license is issued.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area office at (248) 975-5060.
Sincerely,
Al Spafford, Licensing Consultant
Bureau of Children and Adult Licensing
2320 W. Pierson Rd.
Flint, MI 48504
(810) 787-7042

II. METHODOLOGY
05/19/2008 Enrollment
03/12/2009 Inspection completed – On-site
03/12/2009 Inspection completed – Full compliance
03/12/2009 Recommend License Issue
III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
The agency operates offices located in Flint and Saginaw. Administrative and casework
functions are provided in the Flint office and adjunct casework services provide in the
Saginaw branch office.
The Flint office is located of the first floor of a large office building in downtown Flint.
The office provides ample room for casework services and the secure maintenance of
case files.
B. Program Description
The agency provides foster care placement, foster home licensing certification, and
independent living services. The agency functions in the Genesee and Saginaw county
areas were previously operated through the Licensee’s agency located in Jackson, Mi.
The agency provided policies and procedures that have been approved previously and
are operational in the Licensee’s currently licensed offices.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
None.
2

IV. RECOMMENDATION
I recommend issuance of an original provisional license to this child placing agency.
March 19, 2009

Al Spafford Date
